author: Tim Marcin
title: Boris Johnson is in intensive care after his coronavirus symptoms worsened
description: United Kingdom Prime Minister Boris Johnson has been moved to the intensive care unit of London's St. Thomas Hospital after his coronavirus symptoms worsened on Monday. “Over the course of this afternoon, the condition of the Prime Minister has worsened and, …
content:
United Kingdom Prime Minister Boris Johnson has been moved to the intensive care unit of London's St. Thomas Hospital after his coronavirus symptoms worsened on Monday. 
Over the course of this afternoon, the condition of the Prime Minister has worsened and,… [+1291 chars]
